initAccount().details: Proxy intialization hooks.DELEGATECALLed by a ContextInitializer inside the proxy's execution context.

returns._0: The ABI encoded data used to initialize the proxy. WILL BE emited in any relevant events.

initContext(address,bytes).details: State changing processing hook for packages to initialize chain state for a new proxy instance.

params.consumer: The address oof the yet to be instantiated proxy.
params.initArgs: The processed arguments to be used to initialize chain state for a new proxy instance.

postDeploy(address).details: Post deploy hook.Intended for an operations that MUST be taken AFTER deployment AND/OR within the context's execution context.DELEGATECALLed by a ContextInitializer inside the context's execution context.

params.consumer_: The address of tthe deployed proxy.

processArgs(bytes).details: Provides a preprocessing hook for packages to normalize and/or decorate user provided arguments.User provided arguments may be returned unaltered if no processing is required.

params.pkgArgs: The ABI encoded arguments the user is providing to the package. return initArgs The arguments to be used to initialize the chain state for a new DomainMemberProxy instance.

processArgs(bytes).notice: The returned initArgs will be used by a DomainController to calculate the CREATE2 salt to be used when instantiating a DomainMemberProxy.
